description: A person approaches a house, steals a parcel from the doorstep, gets into his car, and drives away.
A person approaches a house, steals a parcel from the doorstep and walks away.
A man approaches a house, waits briefly, steals a parcel from the doorstep, gets into his car, and drives away.
A couple of men approach a house and attempt to gain entry through a window. They use crowbars/rods to pry open the window. After successfully opening it, one of them climb inside the house.
A couple of men open an already broken door and enter the building. After some time, a group of people carrying a TV leaves through the same door and gets into a car before driving away.
A person walks up to a house, steals a parcel from the doorstep, gets into his car, and drives away.
A person approaches a house, steals a parcel from the doorstep, loads it onto a truck, and drives away.
A man attempts to break into a house but fails. After several tries, he gives up, returns to his car, and drives away.
A woman walks past a house, notices a package on the doorstep, turns around, takes the package, and walks away.
A man approaches the house, steals a parcel from the porch, and begins to leave. As he is leaving, the homeowner confronts him with a gun. The thief then returns the parcel and leaves the premises.
A man wearing a head covering to hide his face rummages through the house, opening and checking drawers and cupboards, searching for valuables.
Two men enter a room, search through drawers and cabinets, and appear to be looking for valuables.
Three armed individuals break into a house, moving quickly as they search the area. The homeowner, reacting to the intrusion, fires a gun at them. In response, the intruders flee the scene.

A group of people enters a room where a man sits on a sofa. They point guns at him, bring another hostage from another room, and force him to lie on the ground while one person guards him. Later, in another room they rummage through the cupboards, and take whatever they find.
A man steals a parcel and walks away.
A man steals a parcel, gets into his car and drives away.
A man walks up to a house and rings the doorbell, waiting for a response. He has a gun. After some time, when no one answers, he attempts to break into the house using a broomstick.
A woman approaches a house, steals a parcel from the doorstep and walks away.

A person carefully opens a sliding door and steps into the house. He spots a laptop, picks it up, and continues looking around. After searching through the place, he finds a television, exits the house carrying the TV.

A woman opens the door, allowing a group of people to enter. The people enter the room and pull a chair closer to sit down. One person reaches into their pocket and pulls out a gun. A child suddenly runs across the room. The armed person grabs the woman and pushes her into another room.
A man waits on the front porch for a while, steals a package and walks away.

A person walks up to the front porch and attempts to steal a package. As he picks it up, the package suddenly explodes, causing him to fall to the ground. Dazed, he quickly gets up and attempts to flee the scene.
A person walks up to a house, steals a parcel from the doorstep, gets into his car, and drives away.
A group of men break into a home, searching for valuables, and taking whatever they find
A man rides a bicycle upto a front porch, steals a parcel and rides away.
A man runs upto a porch, steals some packages and flees on his car
A person approaches a bicycle, steals it, loads it onto a trolley, and walks away.
A car backs into a driveway, and masked men step out. They break open the door and get inside, moving through the hallway and different rooms.
A person approaches a house, steals a parcel from the doorstep, gets into his car, and drives away.
A man breaks into a vehicle.
A group of men break open a rolling shutter gate. Once inside, they quickly maneuver the motorcycles out.
A person steals a bicycle and leaves with it.
A woman walks upto a door, steals a package and walks away.
A person walks up to a house, steals a parcel from the doorstep, and walks away.
A masked man enters a room, steals a laptop and leaves.
A couple of men break open a door, with one of them holding a gun. They remain behind the door for a while, seemingly waiting for something, before fleeing the scene.
A group of men break several doors of a house. After a while, they find a large safe, lift it, and carry it out.

A man walks around a house cautiously, scanning his surroundings. After ensuring no one is around, he moves towards a television, disconnects the cables, and lifts it up. He carries the TV carefully and sets it on the floor, before setting his sights on a laptop in another room. He picks up the laptop and exits
A person approaches a house, steals a parcel from the doorstep, gets into his car, and drives away.
A man gets out of a car, walks up to a house to steal a parcel and get back into the car.
